parameters.name: AppId
parameters.description: The ID of the application. You can call the ListApplication operation to query the application ID. For more information, see [ListApplication](~~149390~~).

parameters.name: From
parameters.description:
The source from which data is queried.

*   If you leave this parameter empty, a common query is performed.
*   If you set the value to deploy, you query application information from the deployment page.
